text: Predrag Tasovac (Serbian Cyrillic: Предраг Тасовац; 9 August 1922 – 22 September 2010) was a Serbian actor. He appeared in more than eighty films from 1952 to 2005. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
